cleaned_text: Description The goal of this unit is to show, in more detail, how the Arab and Islamic world influenced western medicine during the point in history known in the western world as the Dark Ages. Additionally, this unit illustrates how Arab and Islamic Medicine was influenced by other cultures, including China and the Western world. Credit Hours: 110; 202: Hadith on Medicine - 54 Credits; 202A: European Influences - 32 Credits; 202B: Arab and Islamic Medical History and Medical Myths - 24 Credits.
